ApplicationPackage.Name: Family Editor Interface
ApplicationPackage.Description: Family Editor Interface helps users create/change content faster in the Family Editor by adding an easy to use layer of sliders that control the family parameters.
ApplicationPackage.Author: Archilizer
ApplicationPackage.HelpFile: ./Content/Family Editor Interface _ Revit _ Autodesk App Store.html
